channel.title: Barrows Help?
channel.description: Well, I wanted to know how to make it so you get a Barrows item 100% of the time, I tried changing [code]addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 100);[/code] to [code]addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 10000);[/code] but that didn't work. Any ideas?

item.title: Barrows Help?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Go into item2.java and search for randombarrows. Remove any items that aren’t barrows.

Read full topic
